comment._content:
Arrived from Europe on the "Kaiser Wilhelm", November 12, 1913, along with several other opera singers.

Another shipboard shot of Caruso:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4545372845/in/photostream/]

Other opera singers were on the voyage:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4464311391/]
